summary: A true-crime enthusiast and a washed up cop facing demotion launch a joint murder investigation to help a mutual friend who is wrongfully charged with murder.
cast: Sang-Woo Kwon|Dong-il Sung|Yeong-hie Seo|Oh Jeong-Se|Dae-han Ji|Bok-rae Jo|Kim Joo-Heon|Park Jun-Myun|Yoon Kyung-Ho|Il-hwa Lee|Seung-Joon Lee|Moo-Je Min|Hae-Joon Park|Sung-Il Park|Min-chae Yoo
title: Tam jeong deo bigining
